title: Marshall Faulk - The Ultimate NFL Running Back
description:
Marshall William Faulk is a former American football player who was a running back in the National Football League for twelve historical seasons. Faulk played college football for San Diego State University, and was a two-time consensus All-American.

He was selected by the Indianapolis Colts as the second overall pick in the 1994 NFL Draft, and he also played professionally for the NFL's St. Louis Rams.

Faulk was inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 2011 and the College Football Hall of Fame in 2017.

Faulk has a charitable foundation in San Diego, California. Since 1994, the Marshall Faulk Foundation has been dedicated to building brighter futures for today’s underprivileged youth. Where they have been able to help young people tackle the challenges they face that often prevent them from achieving their dreams.
author: edwardmylett@yahoo.com (Ed Mylett)
